site_name: Rocca Di Papa75-79 Dulwich VillageLondonSouthwarkSE21 7BJ
description: Variation to reduce any hours that would cause the Late Night Levy to be invoked. Addition of Off Sales to the Premises Licence. During the government's COVID-19 Lockdown measures, social distancing, no contact service and payment, extra hygiene measures will take place and external seating will be out of use. Applicants wish to add in relation to Off Sales: All alcohol sales shall be sold in sealed containers for consumption away from the premises. (add condition 125) All off sales of alcohol will be ancillary to a take away meal or food delivery order. (add condition 342). That all online or phone sales of alcohol are subject to a real time age verification checks. (add condition 4AA)
